nodes.text: Thulpin Reserve was an Imperial-allied military unit maintained on the planet Draenell's Point as part of the Planetary Guard during the Galactic Civil War. Their uniforms were grey and red, with white helmets trimmed with red. The Thulpin Reserve numbered eight soldiers, armed with heavy blaster pistols and vibro-axs, as well as a heavy repeating blaster. They fought in the Battle of Bissillirus, during the planetary raid on agricultural loading platform XT-21s.
